cyclone.name: CLAUDETTE
cyclone.current_location: about 125 miles south of Morgan City, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: moving north toward the Louisiana coast, then forecast to arc northeastward across the southeastern United States during the weekend
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: north-central Gulf Coast near the Louisiana coastline east of Morgan City
cyclone.hours_to_offshore: N/A (system never approaches the Mid-Atlantic coastline)
cyclone.hours_of_strike: 0 (no direct strike expected at Philadelphia Regional Port, PA)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical-storm watch area limited to portions of the north-central Gulf Coast
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical-storm warning from east of Morgan City, LA to the Okaloosa/Walton County line, FL including Lake Pontchartrain, Lake Maurepas and metropolitan New Orleans
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Louisiana, Mississippi, Alabama and far western Florida Panhandle coasts
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: ATLANTA GA (farthest-north point listed in table)
weather_observation.other_hazards: None expected at Philadelphia Regional Port, PA
